pkmkdoc.description: Parallax Propeller Simple Integrated Development Environment SimpleIDE.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1265\cocoasubrtf190 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 \ SimpleIDE is a complete development environment\ for the Parallax Propeller.\ \ \ This installs SimpleIDE (and all components) to\ \ Applications/SimpleIDE \ \ \ After install when the program is first run, SimpleIDE\ will install Documents/SimpleIDE.\ \ Documents/SimpleIDE will contain examples and libraries.\ \ If Documents/SimpleIDE already exists, it will be updated.}
